# Welcome {-}

This is a book of recipes using the [Bookdown](https://bookdown.org/) package for making books and long-form reports.

## Contribute a Recipe {-}

You can contribute a recipe by following the instructions on the [GitHub repository](https://github.com/chrisdaaz/recipe-bookdown). **Enjoy!**

[Download the Book](./recipe-bookdown.pdf){.button}
